main_definition: Photos refers to images captured by a camera, or it is also an abbreviation of 'photographs'. It can also mean the act of capturing these images.

meanings_and_examples.example: I took some great photos during my trip to Paris.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A shortened form of 'photographs' or 'photographic images'
meanings_and_examples.example: They left several photos from their vacation on the table.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of capturing an image using a camera
meanings_and_examples.example: I enjoy taking photos when I go hiking in nature.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A collection or series of photographs
meanings_and_examples.example: She showed us her album filled with family photos from their wedding day.
